name: Game Design 101
description: This playlist consists of videos where Mark Brown, a well-known game developer, teaches you the fundamental lessons of game design. These videos are applicable to pretty much every type of game.

name: Game Development | Logical Programmer
description: This tutorial helps you to learn how to code and make your own game.

name: Godot Game Development
description: This tutorial teaches the best gaming engine to create games, if you are a beginner
